title: CycleTracker: Service workers
summary: Thus far, we've written the HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for CycleTracker. We added a manifest file defining colors, icons, URL, and other app features. We have a working web app! But it isn't yet a PWA. In this section, we will write the JavaScript required to convert our fully functional web application into a PWA that can be distributed as a standalone app and works seamlessly offline.
pageTitle: CycleTracker: Service workers - Progressive web apps | MDN
